document_data.name: Mariochar Bladebeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Mariochar Bladebeard''' was a shrewd, clanless male [[dwarf]] who ruled the dwarven settlement of [[Eartheart]].
document_data.History: Mariochar was elected ruler of Eartheart by the [[Deep Lords]] in [[1346 DR]]. He then went on to be re-elected by them annually over the next twelve years.<ref group="note">The sourcebook "Dwarves Deep" takes place in the year 1358 DR and states that the character has held the post of ruler "...for the past dozen years."
